![Chart Bar des NAS](figures/bar_classify_Del_29_04_22_17h.png)
```{r}
#| label: fig-mtcars
#| fig-cap: "MPG horsepower, colore by trans"
#| echo: true

library(ggplot2)

mtcars2 <- mtcars

mtcars2$am <- factor(
  mtcars$am, 
  labels = c("automatic", "manual"))

ggplot(mtcars2, aes(hp, mpg, color = am)) +
  geom_point() + geom_smooth(formula = y ~ x, 
                             method = "loess") +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")

```
